lines.gurmukhi: 1 siqgurU dw pRXwlw
lines.transliteration_english: Ikonkaar Satigur Prasaadi ?

Shabad OS B.translation: One Oankar, the primal energy, realized through the grace of the divine preceptor

lines.gurmukhi: siqguru scw pwiqswhu pwiqswhwN pwiqswh juhwrI
lines.transliteration_english: Satigur Sachaa Paatisaahu Paatisaahaan Paatisaahu Juhaaree.

Shabad OS B.translation: I salute the true Guru who is the true king of kings.

lines.gurmukhi: swDsMgiq sicKMfu hY Awie JroKY KolY bwrI
lines.transliteration_english: Saadhasangati Sachi Khandu Hai Aai Jharokhai Kholai Baaree.

Shabad OS B.translation: The Holy congregation is the abode of truth where the gates of mind are opened.

lines.gurmukhi: Aimau ikrix inJr JrY Anhd nwd vwiein drbwrI
lines.transliteration_english: Amiu Kirani Nijhar Jharai Anahad Naad Vaaini Darabaaree.

Shabad OS B.translation: The fountain of nectar flows here forever and the courtiers play the unstruck melody.

lines.gurmukhi: pwiqswhwN dI mjlsY iprm ipAwlw pIvx BwrI
lines.transliteration_english: Paatisaahaan Dee Majalasai Piramu Piaalaa Peevan Bhaaree.

Shabad OS B.translation: In the assembly of the kings it is very difficult to drink the cup of love.

lines.gurmukhi: swkI hoie pIlwvxw auls ipAwlY KrI KumwrI
lines.transliteration_english: Saakee Hoi Peelaavanaa Ulas Piaalai Kharee Khoumaaree.

Shabad OS B.translation: The Guru becomes the beloved butler and makes one drink it, the delight of His tasted cup becomes multiplied.

lines.gurmukhi: Bwie Bgiq BY clxw msq Almsq sdw huisAwrI
lines.transliteration_english: Bhaai Bhagati Bhai Chalanaa Masat Alamasat Sadaa Housiaaree.

Shabad OS B.translation: Whosoever moves in the fear of loving devotion, he being carefree of the worldliness remains alert.

lines.gurmukhi: Bgq vCl hoie Bgq BMfwrI ]1]
lines.transliteration_english: Bhagat Vachhalu Hoi Bhagati Bhandaaree ?1?

Shabad OS B.translation: Kind to the devotees, God, becomes their caretaker and fulfils all their desires.

lines.gurmukhi: 2 gurmuK SRuiq dw Byd jro

Shabad OS B.translation: Gurmukhs assimilate the mystery of spiritulism

lines.gurmukhi: iekqu nukqY hoie jwie mhrmu mujrmu KYr KuAwrI
lines.transliteration_english: Ikatu Noukatai Hoi Jaai Maharamu Mujaramu Khair Khuaaree.

Shabad OS B.translation: In Persian language only a point makes ‘mahram’ the confidant, a mujarim, the offender.

lines.gurmukhi: msqwnI ivic mslqI gYr mhil jwxw mnu mwrI
lines.transliteration_english: Masataanee Vichi Masalatee Gair Mahali Jaanaa Manu Maaree.

Shabad OS B.translation: Gurmukhs remain exhilarated in the holy congregation and they do not like to go to other assemblies.

lines.gurmukhi: gl n bwhir inklY hukmI bMdy kwr krwrI
lines.transliteration_english: Gal N Baahari Nikalai Houkamee Banday Kaar Karaaree.

Shabad OS B.translation: In the will of the Lord they serve vigorously and try not to make it public.

lines.gurmukhi: gurmuiK suK Plu iprm rsu dyih ibdyh vfy vIcwrI
lines.transliteration_english: Guramoukhi Soukh Phalu Piram Rasu Dayhi Bidayh Vaday Veechaaree.

Shabad OS B.translation: Such gurmukhs attain the fruit of happiness and giving up the pride of body, and becoming bodiless they become serious thinkers.

lines.gurmukhi: guru mUriq gur sbdu suix swDsMgiq Awsxu inrMkwrI
lines.transliteration_english: Gur Moorati Gur Sabadu Souni Saadhasangati Aasanu Nirankaaree.

Shabad OS B.translation: The word of the Guru is their idol and the holy congregation is the seat of the formless Lord.

lines.gurmukhi: Awid purKu Awdysu kir AMmiRqu vylw sbdu AwhwrI
lines.transliteration_english: Aadi Purakhu Aadaysu Kari Anmritu Vaylaa Sabadu Aahaaree.

Shabad OS B.translation: Bowing before the primeval Purusa, in the ambrosial hours they chew the Word (gurbani).

lines.gurmukhi: Aivgiq giq AgwD boiD AkQ kQw Asgwh ApwrI
lines.transliteration_english: Avigati Gati Agaadhi Bodhi Akad Kadaa Asagaah Apaaree.

Shabad OS B.translation: To have knowledge of the dynamism of that unmanifest Lord is a very deep experience, and to say something of that ineffable Lord is a Herculean task.

lines.gurmukhi: shin Avtx praupkwrI ]2]
lines.transliteration_english: Sahani Avatanu Paraoupakaaree ?2?

Shabad OS B.translation: Only Gurmukhs suffer while doing good to others.

lines.gurmukhi: 3 gurisK kaux sdwvy

Shabad OS B.translation: Who may be called a Sikh of the Guru

lines.gurmukhi: gurmuiK jnm skwrQw gur isK imil gursrxI AwieAw
lines.transliteration_english: Guramoukhi Janamu Sakaaradaa Gurasikh Mili Gurasaranee Aaiaa.

Shabad OS B.translation: The life of that gurmukh is fortunate whom meeting some Sikh of the Guru has come to the shelter of the Guru.

lines.gurmukhi: Awid purK Awdysu kir sPl mUriq gur drsnu pwieAw
lines.transliteration_english: Aadi Purakh Aadaysu Kari Saphal Moorati Guradarasanu Paaiaa.

Shabad OS B.translation: He bows before primeval Purusa (God) and becomes blessed after having the sight of such a Guru.

lines.gurmukhi: prdKxw fMfauq kir msqku crx kml gur lwieAw
lines.transliteration_english: Paradakhanaa Dandaout Kari Masataku Charan Kaval Gur Laaiaa.

Shabad OS B.translation: After circumambulation he bows on the lotus feet of Guru.

lines.gurmukhi: siqguru purK dieAwl hoie vwihgurU scu mMqRRu suxwieAw
lines.transliteration_english: Satiguru Purakh Daiaalu Hoi Vaahiguroo Sachu Mantr Sounaaiaa.

Shabad OS B.translation: Becoming kind, the Guru recites true mantra Vaheguru for him.

lines.gurmukhi: sc rwis rhrwis dy pYrIN pY jgu pYrI pwieAw
lines.transliteration_english: Sach Raasi Raharaasi Day Paireen Pai Jagu Pairee Paaiaa.

Shabad OS B.translation: The Sikh with his capital of devotion falls at the feet of Guru and the whole world bows at his feet.

lines.gurmukhi: kwmu kroDu ivroDu hir loBu mohu AhMkwru qjwieAw
lines.transliteration_english: Kaam Karodhu Virodhu Hari Lobhu Mohu Ahankaaru Tajaaiaa.

Shabad OS B.translation: God (the Guru) eradicates his lust, anger and resistance and gets his greed, infatuation and ego erased.

lines.gurmukhi: squ sMqoKu dieAw Drmu nwmu dwnu iesnwnu diRVwieAw
lines.transliteration_english: Satu Santokhu Daiaa Dharamu Naamu Daanu Isanaanu Drirhaaiaa.

Shabad OS B.translation: Instead, the Guru makes him practise truth, contentment, dharma, name, charity and ablution.

lines.gurmukhi: gur isiK lY gurisKu sdwieAw ]3]
lines.transliteration_english: Gur Sikh Lai Gurasikhu Sadaaiaa ?3?

Shabad OS B.translation: Adopting the teachings of the Guru, the individual is called a Sikh of the Guru.

lines.gurmukhi: 4 gurmuK

Shabad OS B.translation: Gurmukh

lines.gurmukhi: sbd suriq ilvlIxu hoie swDsMgiq sic myil imlwieAw
lines.transliteration_english: Sabad Surati Livaleenu Hoi Saadhasangati Sachi Mayli Milaaiaa.

Shabad OS B.translation: Absorbing consciousness into the Word, the gurmukhs meet at the true meeting centre of the holy congregation.

lines.gurmukhi: hukm rjweI clxw Awpu gvwie n Awpu jxwieAw
lines.transliteration_english: Houkam Rajaaee Chalanaa Aapu Gavaai N Aapu Janaaiaa.

Shabad OS B.translation: They move in the will of the Lord and erasing their ego they do not make themselves to be noticed.

lines.gurmukhi: gur aupdysu Awvysu kir praupkwir Acwir luBwieAw
lines.transliteration_english: Gur Oupadays Avaysu Kari Paraoupakaari Achaari Loubhaaiaa.

Shabad OS B.translation: Inspired by the teachings of Guru they always remain eager to undertake the acts of public weal.

lines.gurmukhi: iprm ipAwlw Aipau pI shj smweI Ajru jrwieAw
lines.transliteration_english: Piram Piaalaa Apiu Pee Sahaj Samaaee Ajaru Jaraaiaa.

Shabad OS B.translation: Quaffing the grand cup of the ineffable knowledge of the Lord and merging in equipoise, they bear the unbearable, ever-descending energy of the Lord.

lines.gurmukhi: imTw bolxu iniv clxu hQhu dy kY Blw mnwieAw
lines.transliteration_english: Mitdaa Bolanu Nivi Chalanu Hadahu Day Kai Bhalaa Manaaiaa.

Shabad OS B.translation: They speak sweetly, move humbly and giving donations wish everybody well.

lines.gurmukhi: iek min ieku ArwDxw duibDw dUjw Bwau imtwieAw
lines.transliteration_english: Ik Mani Iku Araadhanaa Doubidhaa Doojaa Bhaau Mitaaiaa.

Shabad OS B.translation: Decimating their dubiety and sense of duality, they with single mind adore that One Lord.

lines.gurmukhi: gurmuiK suK Pl inj pdu pwieAw ]4]
lines.transliteration_english: Guramoukhi Soukh Phal Nij Padu Paaiaa ?4?

Shabad OS B.translation: Gurmukhs know themselves in the form of the fruit of delight and attain the supreme bliss.

lines.gurmukhi: 5 gur is`KI

Shabad OS B.translation: Sikhism

lines.gurmukhi: gurisKI bwrIk hY KMfy Dwr glI Aiq BIVI
lines.transliteration_english: Gurasikhee Baareek Hai Khanday Dhaar Galee Ati Bheerhee.

Shabad OS B.translation: The discipleship of the Guru is very subtle like a sword edge and narrow alley.

lines.gurmukhi: EQY itkY n Buxhxw cil n skY aupir kIVI
lines.transliteration_english: Aodai Tikai N Bhounahanaa Chali N Sakai Oupari Keerhee.

Shabad OS B.translation: Mosquito’s and ants cannot stand there.

lines.gurmukhi: vwlhuM inkI AwKIAY qylu iqlhuM lY kolHU pIVI
lines.transliteration_english: Vaalahu Nikee Aakheeai Taylu Tilahu Lai Kolh Peerhee.

Shabad OS B.translation: It is thinner than hair and as the oil of sesame is obtained after crushing it in the crusher with great difficulty, the discipleship of the Guru is not obtained easily.

lines.gurmukhi: gurmuiK vMsI prmhMs KIr nIr inrnau cuMij vIVI
lines.transliteration_english: Guramoukhi Vansee Param Hans Kheer Neer Niranau Chounji Veerhee.

Shabad OS B.translation: Gurmukhs are descendants of swans and separate water from milk with their beak of thoughtfulness.

lines.gurmukhi: islw AlUxI ctxI mwxk moqI cog invIVI
lines.transliteration_english: Silaa Aloonee Chatanee Maanak Motee Chog Niveerhee.

Shabad OS B.translation: Like licking of the salt-less stone they pick up the rubies and jewels to eat.

lines.gurmukhi: gurmuiK mwrig clxw Aws inrwsI JIV auJIVI
lines.transliteration_english: Guramoukhi Maaragi Chalanaa Aas Niraasee Jheerh Ujheerhee.

Shabad OS B.translation: The gurmukhs repudiating all hopes and desires move on the way of detachment and tear down the veil of Maya.

lines.gurmukhi: shij srovir scKMif swDsMgiq sc qKiq hrIVI
lines.transliteration_english: Sahaji Sarovari Sach Khandi Saadhasangati Sach Takhati Hareerhee.

Shabad OS B.translation: Holy congregation, the abode of truth and throne of the true Lord is the manasarovar for the gurmukhs.

lines.gurmukhi: cViH iekIh piq pauVIAw inrMkwru gur sbdu shIVI
lines.transliteration_english: Charhhi Ikeeh Pati Paurheeaa Nirankaaru Gur Sabadu Saheerhee.

Shabad OS B.translation: Climbing the steps of non-duality they adopt the Word of the formless Guru.

lines.gurmukhi: gUMgY dI imiTAweIAY AkQ kQw ivsmwdu bcIVI
lines.transliteration_english: Goungai Dee Mitdiaaeeai Akad Kadaa Visamaadu Bacheerhee.

Shabad OS B.translation: They enjoy His ineffable story like they enjoyment by a dumb person of the sweets.

lines.gurmukhi: gurmuiK suK Plu shij AlIVI ]5]
lines.transliteration_english: Guramoukhi Soukhu Phalu Sahaji Aleerhee ?5?

Shabad OS B.translation: Through the natural devotion, the gurmukhs attain the fruit of delight.

lines.gurmukhi: 6 gur crn kml

Shabad OS B.translation: Lotus feet of Guru

lines.gurmukhi: gurmuiK suK Pl iprm rsu crxodku gur crx pKwly
lines.transliteration_english: Guramoukhi Soukh Phal Piram Rasu Charanodaku Gur Charan Pakhaalay.

Shabad OS B.translation: Gurmukhs having the desire of the fruits of delight with all love wash the feet of the guru.

lines.gurmukhi: suK sMput ivic riK kY crx kvl mkrMd ipAwly
lines.transliteration_english: Soukh Sanpout Vichi Rakhi Kai Charan Kaval Makarand Piaalay.

Shabad OS B.translation: They make cups of the nectar of lotus feet and quaff it with complete delight.

lines.gurmukhi: kaulwlI sUrj muKI lK kvl iKVdy rlIAwly
lines.transliteration_english: Kaulaalee Sooraj Moukhee Lakh Kaval Khirhaday Raleeaalay.

Shabad OS B.translation: Considering the feet of the Guru as sum they blossom like lotus.

lines.gurmukhi: cMdRmuKI huie kumudnI crx kvl sIql AmIAwly
lines.transliteration_english: Chandr Moukhee Hui Koumudanee Charan Kaval Seetal Ameeaalay.

Shabad OS B.translation: Again becoming water lily attracted towards moon, they enjoy nectar from the lotus feet.

lines.gurmukhi: crx kvl dI vwsnw lK sUrj hovin Ail kwly
lines.transliteration_english: Charan Kaval Dee Vaasanaa Lakh Sooraj Hovani Bhaur Kaalay.

Shabad OS B.translation: To have the fragrance of the lotus feet many suns become black bees.

lines.gurmukhi: lK qwry sUrij cVHy ijau Cip jwin n Awp smHwly
lines.transliteration_english: Lakh Taaray Sooraji Charhhi Jiu Chhapi Jaani N Aap Samhaalay.

Shabad OS B.translation: Wen the sun rises, myriad stars, unable to maintain themselves, hide.

lines.gurmukhi: crx kvl dl joiq ivic lK sUrij luik jwin rvwly
lines.transliteration_english: Charan Kaval Dal Joti Vichi Lakh Sooraji Louki Jaani Ravaalay.

Shabad OS B.translation: Likewise with the light of petals of lotus feet, myriad suns are concealed.

lines.gurmukhi: gur isK lY gurisK suKwly ]6]
lines.transliteration_english: Gur Sikh Lai Gurasikh Soukhaalay ?6?

Shabad OS B.translation: Receiving the teaching of the Guru, the disciples have themselves become the house of all pleasures.

lines.gurmukhi: 7 eykqw pr diRStwNq

Shabad OS B.translation: Example of unity

lines.gurmukhi: cwir vrn iek vrn kir vrn Avrn qmol gulwly
lines.transliteration_english: Chaari Varani Ik Varan Kari Varan Avaran Tamol Gulaalay.

Shabad OS B.translation: As in betel leaf all the colours mix and become one red colour, likewise mixing all the varnas one Sikh has been created.

lines.gurmukhi: Ast Dwqu ieku Dwqu kir vyd kqyb n Bydu ivcwly
lines.transliteration_english: Asat Dhaatu Iku Dhaatu Kari Vayd Katayb N Bhaydu Vichaalay.

Shabad OS B.translation: Eight metals mixing up make one metal (alloy); similarly there is no difference among Vedas and the Katebas (the Semitic scriptures).

lines.gurmukhi: cMdn vwsu vxwsupiq APl sPl ivic vwsu bhwly
lines.transliteration_english: Chandan Vaasu Vanaasoupati Aphal Saphal Vichi Vaasu Bahaalay.

Shabad OS B.translation: The sandal perfumes the whole vegetation whether it is devoid of fruit or full of fruit.

lines.gurmukhi: lohw suienw hoie kY suienw hoie sugMiD ivKwly
lines.transliteration_english: Lohaa Suinaa Hoi Kai Suinaa Hoi Sougandhi Vikhaalay.

Shabad OS B.translation: Touching the philosopher’s stone, iron becoming gold, again points towards its further beauty (of making itself useful for the needy ones).

lines.gurmukhi: suieny AMdir rMg rs crxwNmiRq AMmiRqu mqvwly
lines.transliteration_english: Suinay Andari Rang Ras Charanaamit Anmritu Matavaalay.

Shabad OS B.translation: Then in gold in the form of gurmukh, the colour (of Name) and elixir (of love) enter and he becomes carefree of the world around.

lines.gurmukhi: mwxk moqI suieinAhu jgmg joiq hIry prvwly
lines.transliteration_english: Maanak Motee Suiniahu Jagamag Joti Heeray Paravaalay.

Shabad OS B.translation: Now all the qualities of rubies, pearls, diamonds emerge in that gold-gurmukh.

lines.gurmukhi: idb dyih idb idsit hoie sbd suriq idb joiq aujwly
lines.transliteration_english: Dib Dayh Dibadisati Hoi Sabad Surati Dibajoti Ujaalay.

Shabad OS B.translation: Becoming divine body and divine sight the consciousness of gurmukh concentrates on the light of the divine Word.

lines.gurmukhi: gurmuiK suK Pl risk rswly ]7]
lines.transliteration_english: Guramoukhi Soukh Phalu Rasik Rasaalay ?7?

Shabad OS B.translation: Thus, adopting the delight of devotion, the gurmukhs become full of many delights.

lines.gurmukhi: 8 gurmuKwN dI pRIiq vrxn

Shabad OS B.translation: Love of the gurmukhs

lines.gurmukhi: iprm ipAwlw swDsMg sbd suriq Anhd ilv lweI
lines.transliteration_english: Piram Piaalaa Saadhasang Sabad Surati Anahad Liv Laaee.

Shabad OS B.translation: Quaffing the cup of love in the holy congregation, the Sikhs of Guru absorb their consciousness in the Word.

lines.gurmukhi: iDAwnI cMd ckor giq AMmiRq diRsit siRsit vrsweI
lines.transliteration_english: Dhiaanee Chand Chakor Gati Anmrat Drisati Srisati Varasaaee.

Shabad OS B.translation: As the bird chakor meditates on moon to enjoy cool, from their sight also pours the nectar.

lines.gurmukhi: Gnhr cwqiRk mor ijau Anhd Duin suix pwiel pweI
lines.transliteration_english: Ghanahar Chaatrik Mor Jiu Anahad Dhouni Souni Paail Paaee.

Shabad OS B.translation: Listening to the roar of clouds they dance like rain bird and peacock.

lines.gurmukhi: crx kvl mkrMd ris suK sMput huie Bvru smweI
lines.transliteration_english: Charan Kaval Makarand Rasi Soukh Sanpout Hui Bhavaru Samaaee.

Shabad OS B.translation: To taste the nectar of the lotus feet they turn themselves into the black bee and become one with the storehouse of delight (of the Lord).

lines.gurmukhi: suK swgr ivic mIn hoie gurmuiK cwil n Koj KujweI
lines.transliteration_english: Soukh Saagar Vichi Meen Hoi Guramoukhi Chaali N Khoj Khujaaee.

Shabad OS B.translation: The way of the gurmukhs is not known to anybody; similar to fish they live in the ocean of happiness.

lines.gurmukhi: AipE pIAxu inJr Jrx Ajru jrx nw AlKu lKweI
lines.transliteration_english: Apiao Peeanu Nijhar Jharan Ajaru Jaran N Alakhu Lakhaaee.

Shabad OS B.translation: They drink nectar; from them gush forth the springs of nectar; they assimilate the unbearable but still they do not make them noticed by any one.

lines.gurmukhi: vIh iekIh aulMiG kY gurisK gurmuiK suK Pl pweI
lines.transliteration_english: Veeh Ikeeh Ulaghi Kai Gurasikh Guramoukhi Soukh Phalu Paaee.

Shabad OS B.translation: Going across all the stages (of three-dimensional nature-prakarti) they attain the fruits of delights.

lines.gurmukhi: vwihgurU vfI vifAweI ]8]
lines.transliteration_english: Vaahiguroo Vadee Vadiaaee ?8?

Shabad OS B.translation: Wondrous is the Vaheguru whose greatness is grand.

lines.gurmukhi: 9 gurU pRIqI

Shabad OS B.translation: Love for the Guru

lines.gurmukhi: kCU AwNfw iDAwnu Dir kir prpku ndI ivic AwxY
lines.transliteration_english: Kachhoo Aandaa Dhiaanu Dhari Kari Parapaku Nadee Vichi Aanai.

Shabad OS B.translation: Tortoise lays its eggs in the sands but having full care of them on their maturity, it brings them into the river.

lines.gurmukhi: kUMj irdY ismrxu krY lY bcw aufdI AsmwxY
lines.transliteration_english: Koonj Ridai Simaranu Karai Lai Bachaa Udadee Asamaanai.

Shabad OS B.translation: The florican also under its full care makes its off spring fly in the sky.

lines.gurmukhi: bqk bcw quir qurw jl Ql vrqY shij ivfwxY
lines.transliteration_english: Batak Bachaa Turi Turai Jal Dal Varatai Sahaji Vidaanai.

Shabad OS B.translation: The swan also in its very natural way teaches its young ones to move on water as well as on earth.

lines.gurmukhi: koiel pwlY kwvxI imldw jwie kutMb is\\\\wxY
lines.transliteration_english: Koil Paalai Kaavanee Miladaa Jaai Koutanbi Siaanai.

Shabad OS B.translation: The crow maintains the offspring’s of cuckoo but as and when they grow up, they, identifying the voice of their mother, go and meet her.

lines.gurmukhi: hMs vMsu vis mwnsir mwxk moqI cog cugwxY
lines.transliteration_english: Hans Vansu Vasi Maanasari Maanak Motee Chog Chougaanai.

Shabad OS B.translation: The progeny of swans learn to pick up pearls while living in the Manasarovar, the sacred tank.

lines.gurmukhi: igAwin iDAwin ismrix sdw siqgur isKu rKY inrbwxY
lines.transliteration_english: Giaan Dhiaani Simarani Sadaa Satiguru Sikhu Rakhai Nirabaanai.

Shabad OS B.translation: Giving the technique of knowledge, meditation and remembrance to the Sikh, the Guru liberates him forever.

lines.gurmukhi: BUq BivKhuN vrqmwn qiRBvx soJI mwxu inmwxY
lines.transliteration_english: Bhooh Bhavikhahu Varatamaan Tribhavan Sojhee Maanu Nimaanai.

Shabad OS B.translation: The Sikh now knows the future, present and past but he gets honours by becoming humble.

lines.gurmukhi: jwqI suMdr loku n jwxY ]9]
lines.transliteration_english: Jaatee Soundar Loku N Jaanai ?9?

Shabad OS B.translation: The ilk of the gurmukhs is grand but people do not know this fact.

lines.gurmukhi: 10 gur is`K dI ivSyKqw

Shabad OS B.translation: Especiality of the Sikh of Guru

lines.gurmukhi: cMdn vws vxwspiq bwvn cMdin cMdn hoeI
lines.transliteration_english: Chandan Vaasu Vanaasapati Baavan Chandani Chandanu Hoee.

Shabad OS B.translation: With the fragrance of sandalwood the whole vegetation becomes sandal.

lines.gurmukhi: Pl ivxu cMdnu bwvnw Awid Anwid ibAMqu sdoeI
lines.transliteration_english: Phal Vinu Chandanu Baavanaa Aadi Anaadi Biantu Sadoee.

Shabad OS B.translation: Though itself the sandal is without fruit but it is always considered as costly.

lines.gurmukhi: cMdnu bwvn cMdnhuN cMdn vwsu n cMdnu koeI
lines.transliteration_english: Chandanu Baavan Chandanahu Chandan Vaasu N Chandanu Koee.

Shabad OS B.translation: But the plant, which becomes sandal through the fragrance of sandal, cannot make any other plant sandal.

lines.gurmukhi: AstuDwqu ieku Dwqu hoie pwrs prsy kMcn joeI
lines.transliteration_english: Asatudhaatu Iku Dhaatu Hoi Paaras Parasay Kanchanu Joee.

Shabad OS B.translation: Eight metals touching the philosopher’s stone becomes gold but that gold cannot produce further gold.

lines.gurmukhi: kMcn hoie n kMcnhuN vrqmwn vrqY siB loeI
lines.transliteration_english: Kanchan Hoi N Kanchanahu Varatamaan Varatai Sabhi Loee.

Shabad OS B.translation: All this is performed in the present only (but the Sikh of Guru makes many like himself; they further become competent to transform others into a Sikh way of life).

lines.gurmukhi: ndIAwN nwly gMg sMig swgr sMgim Kwrw soeI
lines.transliteration_english: Nadeeaa Naalay Gang Sangi Saagar Sangami Khaaraa Soee.

Shabad OS B.translation: Rivers, streams and even the Ganges become brackish in the company of ocean.

lines.gurmukhi: bgulw hMsu n hoveI mwn srovr jwie KloeI
lines.transliteration_english: Bagulaa Hansu N Hovaee Maan Sarovari Jaai Khaloee.

Shabad OS B.translation: The crane never becomes swan even if it sits at Manasarovar.

lines.gurmukhi: vIhwN dY vrqwrY EeI ]10]
lines.transliteration_english: Veehaan Dai Varataarai Aoee ?10?
